summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests for the Modflow 6 groundwater flow modeling components, verifying correct clipping of model boundaries, proper rendering and writing of model files, and validation of required packages, along with several helper utilities used in the tests.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of the groundwater flow modeling functionality within the imod framework, enabling reliable environmental simulations and clear error reporting for missing or malformed model packages.
